nodes.text: Begas Tok was a crime lord.
Begas Tok was active on Entralla and the Velcar Free Commerce Zone during the Galactic Civil War.

In the years following the Battle of Endor, Tok bought Zipthar hexa-crystals from the smugglers Reina Gale and Rollos in order to sell them in the sector and make a considerable return on his investment.

However, the deal was interrupted by the intervention of the Pentastar Patrol. In fact Tok betrayed the smugglers to the police. He planned to recover both the crystals and the credits. Tok wasn't worried about the police because he was permitted to conduct trade in hexa-crystals.
Begas Tok was a small Human Male with a wheezing style of speech.
